All Implemented Interfaces:
FullyInitializable, Initializable, Activatible, Learnable, LidaTask, java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<LidaTask>
public class TriggerTask
extends LidaTaskImpl

TriggerTask is executed when the Timer object goes off. In this case the GlobalWorkspace is told to trigger the broadcast

Author:
Javier
